fields.title: Celebrate with Us
fields.desc:
Thank you for joining us on our special day. We're sure you have tons of questions, so we hope this will help!

Our wedding ceremony starts at 5:30 pm, EDT. Doors open at 5:00 pm. Please check back later as we will have a gift registry available through this website.

fields.title: Attending In Person
fields.desc: For those of you joining in-person, don't worry about the weather; the ceremony will be inside an enclosed, heated tent. It is a formal dress code, with beach-ey colors. If you haven't guessed, we will be on the beach (in the smallest town in Massachusetts)! Cocktail hour will be inside the venue, with hors d'oeuvres and an open bar. For those driving in, there is plenty of parking at the venue.

fields.title: Celebrating Virtually
fields.desc: For our virtual friends and family, you will receive an email with the livestream link closer to the date. If you miss our email, come back here and we will have the link available.
